medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced diffuse abdominal discomfort and nausea for 2 weeks, which worsened over the past 5 days with pain migrating to her right lower quadrant, increasing in severity. She has had minimal food or fluid intake for the past few days due to pain. There were also recent episodes of non-bilious emesis and non-bloody diarrhea once 2 days ago.
